verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Out of the depths <S%H4615><s%> I have cried <S%H7121><s%> to Thee, O Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice! <S%H6963><s%> Let Thine ears <S%H241><s%> be attentive <S%H9533><s%> To the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> Thou, Lord, <S%H3050><s%> shouldst mark <S%H8104><s%> iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> could stand <S%H5975><s%>?
But there is forgiveness <S%H5547><s%> with Thee, That Thou mayest be feared. <S%H3372><s%>
I wait <S%H6960><s%> for the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> does wait, <S%H6960><s%> And in His word <S%H1697><s%> do I hope. <S%H3176><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> [waits] for the Lord <S%H136><s%> More <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the watchmen <S%H8104><s%> for the morning; <S%H1242><s%> [Indeed, more than] the watchmen <S%H8104><s%> for the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hope <S%H3176><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> For with the Lord <S%H3068><s%> there is lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> And with Him is abundant <S%H7235><s%> redemption. <S%H6304><s%>
And He will redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> From all <S%H3605><s%> his iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
